actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution to amend the standing rules of the Senate.

summary.text: Amends rule V of the Standing Rules of the Senate to direct the Presiding Officer to count the Senators present to determine the presence of a quorum during cloture proceedings in the event of a question raised as to the presence of a quorum. Specifies the rule to be followed if the Presiding Officer determines that a quorum is not present.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the standing rules of the Senate.
